author: Dario Taraborelli

resources.description:
Hourly event count and click-thorugh rates for iteration #1 of the Timestamp Position Modification Experiment.

**Field definition**

* hour: timestamp
* expr1_0_imp: landing page impressions, experimental condition, unregistered users 
* expr1_1_imp: landing page impressions, experimental condition, registered users
* ctrl1_0_imp: landing page impressions, control condition, unregistered users
* ctrl1_1_imp: landing page impressions, control condition, registered users
* expr1_0_hist: history tab clicks, experimental condition, unregistered users
* expr1_1_hist: : history tab clicks, experimental condition, registered users
* ctrl1_0_hist: history tab clicks, control condition, unregistered users
* ctrl1_1_hist: history tab clicks, control condition, registered users
* expr1_0_ts: modified timestamp link clicks, experimental condition, unregistered users
* expr1_1_ts: modified timestamp link clicks, experimental condition, registered users
* expr1_0_hist_ctr: history tab click-through rate, experimental condition, unregistered users
* expr1_1_hist_ctr: history tab click-through rate, experimental condition, registered users
* ctrl1_0_hist_ctr: history tab click-through rate, control condition, unregistered users
* ctrl1_1_hist_ctr: history tab click-through rate, control condition, registered users
* expr1_0_ts_ctr: timestamp link click-through rate, experimental condition, unregistered users
* expr1_1_ts_ctr: timestamp link click-through rate, experimental condition, registered users
resources.name: e3_tpm_exp1_hourly_events.tsv

organization.description:
A collection of datasets about Wikipedia and other projects run by the [Wikimedia Foundation](http://wikimediafoundation.org). The collection is open to contributions by researchers not affiliated with the Foundation.

Our overall data policy is to release into the [public domain](http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/) all datasets that don't require attribution and to license datasets that include textual/media contributions from Wikimedians under the appropriate open license, most commonly a [CC BY 3.0 license](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/).
organization.title: Wikimedia
organization.name: wikimedia

name: wikipedia-e3-timestamp-position-modification
notes: This experiment looks at the effects of linking to the revision history of Wikipedia articles with a [prominent "last modified" timestamp](https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Research:Timestamp_position_modification). Currently, the only way for readers to discover that Wikipedia articles are "alive" is by clicking on the history tab. The aim of this experiment is to measure to what extent we can surface the revision history of Wikipedia articles as a vector for [new editor engagement](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Editor_engagement).
title: Wikipedia Editor Engagement Experiments: Timestamp position modification
